title: # 303 - Cynthia Sass & ME
description:
Today I sit down in the mancave with my nutritionist Cynthia Sass. We talk about my diet, my bender on the tour tour, healthy eating, how Cynthia got started as a nutritionist, intermittent fasting, and much more!
For more information you can go to Cynthia's website www.Cynthiasass.com
Twitter: @CynthiaSass
Instagram: Cyn_Sass

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcasted
